text: Eupyrgota is a genus of flies in the family Pyrgotidae. A number of its species were originally from Apyrgota and Taeniomastix, which in 2014 were made synonyms of Eupyrgota by V. Korneyev. == Species == Apyrgota marshalli Hendel, 1914 was transferred to Afropyrgota. Apyrgota breviventris Shi, 1996, Apyrgota fura Shi, 1996, Apyrgota jiangleensis Shi, 1994 and Apyrgota longa Shi, 1996 were transferred to Tylotrypes. == References == Category:Pyrgotidae Category:Diptera of Africa Category:Brachycera genera Category:Taxa named by Daniel William Coquillett
title: Eupyrgota
